newsitem.title: USA: Wind River licenses Spyglass's device mosaic.
newsitem.headline: Wind River licenses Spyglass's device mosaic.

text.p: Spyglass Inc said Monday its Device Mosaic browser software will be part of Wind River Systems' new Tornado for Embedded Internet product line.
Terms of the deal were not disclosed.
Wind River provides operating systems for various devices, such as telecommunications, data communications, office automation, networking, medical and industrial products.
The company's Tornado for Embedded Internet line will be available in the third quarter, Spyglass said.

Spyglass said last year it would focus on providing software and services to make non-personal computer devices work with the Internet's World Wide Web. Spyglass said a critical element in its business model is to develop distribution relationships with embedded software vendors such as Wind River, which are important in getting Spyglass technology used in products such as set-top boxes, printers, industrial controls and medical devices.
